title: Did President Trump make these observations in favour of life?
subtitle: Mimi rearranged excerpts from President Donald Trump ' s previous remarks in March of the 46th Annual for Life in January 2019.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: President Donald Trump: I have signed a letter to Congress to explain that if they send any legislation to my office that weakens the protection of human life, I will issue the veto, every child is a sacred gift from God, every life worth protecting, and we know that every life has meaning and every life deserves protection.
